title: Plat Support main looking for adc to duo
body:
Currently Gold1 however have a 70% win rate with 1800MMR and am being matched again plat2-4 players.

Main Ali, Janna, Raka

Looking for a Plat+ adc to climb ranked with, reply here or message me in game.

replies.body:
Am now plat, looking for decent adc to duo with

hit me up ingame
